title: 'Moment of pride': Shubhanshu Shukla, India's 2nd astronaut, returns home
content: Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla, India's second astronaut, returned home after successfully completing Nasa's Axiom-4 mission, landing in India on Sunday. He was greeted by Union Minister Jitendra Singh and Delhi CM Rekha Gupta, along with his wife, Kamna Shukla. Shukla's mission, which included 18 days on the ISS, provides valuable experience for India's Gaganyaan program.

title: High-stakes diplomacy: Why Putin was the real winner during meet with Trump
content: In Anchorage, a summit between Trump and Putin, intended to address the Ukraine conflict, instead bolstered Putin's standing on the global stage. Despite no concessions from Russia, the meeting provided Putin with legitimacy and visibility.

title: Some governors acting like mafia hitmen against citizens: Tushar Gandhi
content: Tushar Gandhi criticized governors, alleging some disrupt governance in opposition-ruled states and act as 'hitmen.' He accused communal forces of manipulating the educated upper class, fostering irrationality and persecution of minorities. The grandson of Mahatma Gandhi also condemned the National Education Policy 2020 for promoting a slave mentality and hiding realities, advocating for state-specific education models.

title: NIA sleuths, cops arrest Andhra man, woman over 'links to Pak terror outfits'
content: NIA and Andhra Pradesh police apprehended Kothwal Noor Mohammed in Dharmavaram for alleged ties to Pakistan-based terror groups. He is accused of engaging in prohibited social media groups and communicating with suspected operatives across the border.

title: SFJ threatens CM Mann; Khalistani graffiti found on Punjab MLA's house
content: Sikhs for Justice (SFJ) has threatened Punjab CM Bhagwant Mann with "political death" starting August 31, the anniversary of Beant Singh's assassination. SFJ chief Gurpatwant Singh Pannun had previously threatened Mann and the Punjab DGP.

title: Apple founder Steve Jobs lived by the rule that God is in …..
content: Steve Jobs, the Apple founder, was a firm believer in the philosophy that "God is in the details," shaping Apple's DNA through meticulous attention to even the smallest design elements. His relentless pursuit of perfection, extending to hidden components, pushed teams to innovate and create exceptional products.

title: US-India trade deal hits bump? American team may defer Aug 25 visit, says report
content: A US delegation's planned visit to India for bilateral trade agreement negotiations is likely postponed, casting uncertainty on the sixth round of discussions. This rescheduling occurs amidst US tariffs on Indian goods and demands for greater access to India's agriculture and dairy sectors.

title: Conduct SIR after local body elections': Maharashtra poll panel urges EC
content: Maharashtra's State Election Commission has requested the Election Commission of India to postpone the special intensive revision of electoral rolls until after the upcoming local body elections. Citing staff shortages and pressure on election machinery due to ward formation and electoral roll bifurcation for the local polls, State Election Commissioner Dinesh Waghmare awaits a response from EC.

title: Tesla senior VP sells 82% shares; CEO Elon Musk says ‘If they don’t….they will be…’
content: Tesla's Tom Zhu has sold over 82% of his Tesla shares since 2023. The sales occurred between 2023 and 2024. Elon Musk warned short sellers of potential losses if Tesla achieves full autonomy. Musk has clashed with Bill Gates over Gates' alleged short position against Tesla. This position reportedly cost Gates $1.5 billion.

title: Jamie Dimon warned of a tech arms race with China
content: The Nvidia H20 chip sales to China are under scrutiny. This has intensified the US-China tech rivalry. Jamie Dimon warns about US vulnerability. He points out dependence on China for essential goods. Chinese regulators question Nvidia chip purchases. They are pushing for domestic alternatives. Nvidia denies security risks. China is asking tech firms to reconsider Nvidia orders.

title: Patrick Mahomes says he refused to believe when Travis Kelce spoke about dating Taylor Swift
content: Patrick Mahomes initially doubted Travis Kelce's relationship with Taylor Swift, needing to witness it to believe it. He acknowledged the increased buzz and attention Swift brought to the stadium. Mahomes also praised Swift's dedication to her new album, revealed on Kelce's podcast, as both athletes focus on their comeback after a Super Bowl loss.

title: 'Parties should have flagged roll errors before polls': EC on 'vote theft' row; presser today
content: Amidst allegations of electoral roll errors and "vote theft," the Election Commission has urged political parties to address concerns during designated periods. The EC refuted claims of collusion and manipulation, emphasizing the importance of timely scrutiny and correction of voter lists. Rahul Gandhi has launched a "Vote Adhikar Yatra" in Bihar, protesting alleged irregularities in the electoral roll revision.

title: Irfan recalls fiery rivalry with Afridi: 'I showed him who the real Pathan is - 11 times'
content: Irfan Pathan has revealed the personal edge to his rivalry with Shahid Afridi, stemming from Afridi's dismissive comments about Pathan's identity early in his career. Pathan admitted that Afridi's words fueled his determination to dismiss him, which he achieved 11 times across formats, including key moments like the 2007 T20 World Cup final.

title: Taylor Swift electrifies Chiefs locker room before Week 3 vs Bears
content: The Kansas City Chiefs' locker room was in disbelief when Taylor Swift attended a game to support Travis Kelce, creating a surreal mix of NFL intensity and pop culture. Players like Chris Jones and Patrick Mahomes expressed their astonishment at Kelce's high-profile romance. This unexpected relationship has highlighted the human side of professional athletes and captivated fans worldwide.

title: Leafs fans on edge as Auston Matthews’ health in doubt before opener
content: As the season opener approaches, the Toronto Maple Leafs are concerned about Auston Matthews' health. His readiness, compounded by Mitch Marner's absence, casts a shadow over the team's offensive capabilities. Matthews' form is crucial for Toronto's ambitions, as his performance directly impacts the team's rhythm and confidence. The Leafs may need to explore options if Matthews isn't at full strength.

title: Leanna Lenee: Jaguars rookie Travis Hunter slid into my DMs while dating
content: Jacksonville Jaguars' rookie Travis Hunter's recent marriage to Leanna Lenee is under scrutiny. Lenee once revealed that Hunter initially contacted her while he was in another relationship, which she rejected. Despite defending their relationship against accusations of ulterior motives, divorce rumors are now circulating, adding to the couple's challenges.

title: ‘Floods came like fire’: Pak’s monsoon misery overflows; toll crosses 350
content: Devastating flash floods and landslides in northern Pakistan have claimed over 350 lives, particularly in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa's Buner district. Triggered by heavy monsoon rains, the disaster swept away homes and infrastructure, evoking memories of the catastrophic 2022 floods. With warnings of further rainfall, rescue efforts are hampered by damaged roads.

title: J&K: Aircraft-shaped balloon with Pak airline logo found in Samba; probe on
content: A Pakistan International Airlines-branded, aircraft-shaped balloon was discovered in Ramgarh, Samba district, raising security concerns. Border Security Force troops are investigating the balloon's origin. Similar incidents involving balloons with Pakistani markings have occurred in the area previously, prompting heightened vigilance by security forces along the International Border and Line of Control.

title: ‘Mountain came down’: Kishtwar survivors dig through rubble; search for loved ones
content: A devastating cloudburst in Jammu and Kashmir's Kishtwar district triggered flash floods, obliterating Chasoti village. At least 60 lives were lost, with scores injured and dozens still missing. Piyra Singh, a survivor, recounted the horror as his home collapsed, claiming the lives of his relatives. Rescue operations are underway as families grapple with immense grief.

title: Shannon Sharpe Lawsuit: Accuser posts “Rescue me” message
content: Shannon Sharpe's legal battle with a former OnlyFans model seemingly concluded with a $23 million settlement, but the controversy lingers. The model's accusations, including threats and alleged sexual assault, led to Sharpe's ESPN departure and damaged reputation. Her recent social media post featuring Bible verses hints at her feelings about the outcome, while Sharpe remains silent on the matter.

title: New Record! Brevis surpasses Kohli, becomes the first-ever batter to ...
content: South Africa's Dewald Brevis eclipsed Virat Kohli's record for most T20I sixes against Australia in Australia, hitting 14 in three matches. Brevis scored a blistering 53 off 26 balls, including six sixes, but South Africa lost the series decider. Australia, wearing black armbands to honor Bob Simpson, initially struggled but ultimately secured victory.

title: 'Trump's tariffs on India stupid': US economist Sachs' key message for New Delhi
content: Economist Jeffrey Sachs criticizes Donald Trump's tariff policies as detrimental to the US economy and a violation of international law, warning of potential legal challenges and geopolitical isolation. Sachs suggests Trump's actions stem from a desire to dominate other nations, particularly BRICS countries, and a flawed approach to the Russia-Ukraine conflict.

title: Patrick Mahomes training shift: Skips Travis Kelce for 40-yard bomb
content: Patrick Mahomes is seemingly evolving his offensive strategy, potentially shifting from relying heavily on Travis Kelce to incorporating rookie Xavier Worthy and other receivers. Mahomes' increased intensity and focus on mechanics during training camp signal a new chapter for the Chiefs' offense. He aims for a more balanced and explosive attack, showcasing sharper passes and deeper reads.

title: Travis Hunter’s college GPA resurfaces amidst his divorce rumors with Leanna Lenee
content: Travis Hunter and Leanna Lenee, who married in May 2025, faced divorce rumors fueled by speculation about a missing prenuptial agreement after Hunter's $46.65 million Jaguars contract. Despite the online chatter and the circulation of Hunter's impressive 3.9 GPA from the University of Colorado, the couple quelled the rumors by adopting a kitten named Uno, showcasing their commitment and love.

title: Trump claims Xi assured him Beijing won’t invade Taiwan during his presidency
content: Donald Trump claimed that Chinese President Xi Jinping assured him China would not invade Taiwan during his presidency, a statement made before discussions with Vladimir Putin regarding the Ukraine invasion. Trump highlighted Xi's patience on the matter, while China views Taiwan as its territory, a stance Taiwan rejects. The Chinese Embassy emphasized the sensitivity of Taiwan in US-China relations.

title: 'Chess doesn't fit women properly': How Divya plans to defy Kasparov's 36-yo remark
content: In 1989, Garry Kasparov claimed women were weaker fighters in chess. Judit Polgar proved him wrong, crossing 2700. Now, 19-year-old Divya Deshmukh, fresh off her Women’s World Cup triumph and Grandmaster title, is stepping into the Open Grand Swiss 2025. Backed by coach Shyam Sundar, her bold move echoes Polgar’s path and signals higher ambitions.

title: Watch: Olympic champ Lyles stunned; Thompson wins 100m at Silesia DL
content: Kishane Thompson triumphed over Noah Lyles in the 100m at the Silesia Diamond League, clocking 9.87 seconds and equalling the meet record. Lyles, the Olympic champion, finished second with 9.90 seconds. Thompson, after missing the 2023 world championships, is now a strong contender for the upcoming event in Tokyo, expressing confidence and excitement for future competitions.

title: Ex-Indian cricketer's son Harry hits maiden fifty in County One-Day Cup - Watch
content: Lancashire's Harry Singh showcased his batting talent with a remarkable fifty at Hove. His father Rudra Pratap Singh represented India in ODIs. Singh's crucial innings helped Lancashire post a competitive total. Sussex, however, displayed resilience. They achieved a thrilling one-wicket victory. Sussex also created a new record for the team.

title: 'Death staring in face': Pak floods kill 344; helicopter crash, mass funerals, destruction
content: Northern Pakistan is reeling from devastating flash floods triggered by intense monsoon rains, resulting in at least 344 fatalities in just 48 hours. The Buner district is the hardest hit, with rescue operations severely hampered by washed-out roads and ongoing heavy rainfall. With more rain expected, officials fear the situation will worsen in the climate-vulnerable nation.

title: Krishna Janmashtami 2025: Puja muhurat, vrat vidhi, fasting & more
content: Krishna Janmashtami 2025, observed on August 15 and 16, celebrates Lord Krishna's birth with fasting, devotional singing, and midnight puja. The Nishita Kaal Puja, the most auspicious time for worship, occurs between 12:04 AM and 12:47 AM on August 16.

title: AUS vs SA: 'Big Show' Maxwell roars as Australia clinch last-over thriller to seal series
content: Glenn Maxwell's explosive 62* off 36 balls propelled Australia to a thrilling two-wicket victory over South Africa in Cairns, securing the T20I series 2-1. Maxwell's calm approach and match-winning reverse scoop sealed the win after Marsh and Head's steady partnership. Australia's recent T20I form, including series wins against multiple teams, positions them as a formidable force.

title: ‘16 days, 23 districts’: Rahul Gandhi launches 'Vote Adhikar Yatra' in Bihar
content: Rahul Gandhi launched the "Vote Adhikar Yatra" in Bihar, protesting alleged voter roll manipulation by the Election Commission ahead of state elections. The 16-day yatra, supported by Mahagathbandhan allies, aims to raise awareness and protect voting rights. Tejashwi Yadav emphasized ensuring no voter is excluded, while Gandhi accuses the EC of collusion with the BJP, a claim the EC denies.

title: 'Set this book on fire': Congress slams NCERT Partition module; BJP hits back
content: A political clash erupted between Congress and BJP. This happened after NCERT released new modules on Partition. The modules placed blame on Congress. Congress refuted the claims. They accused Hindu Mahasabha and Muslim League of collaboration. BJP accused Congress of avoiding inconvenient history. NCERT stated Congress accepted Partition plans. They underestimated Jinnah.

title: 'Frustrating, but ...': Karun Nair on England tour; lauds Gill, Gambhir for clarity
content: India batter Karun Nair reflected on a bittersweet Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy series in England, acknowledging his frustration at not converting starts into big scores despite batting well. He took pride in India's 2-2 series draw against England, crediting the team's resilience and clear messaging from captain Shubman Gill and coach Gautam Gambhir.

title: Alaska meet: Putin reveals US-Russia trade grew by 20% under Trump
content: "Incidentally, when the new administration came to power (in the US), bilateral trade started to grow. It's still very symbolic. Still, we have a growth of 20 per cent," Putin said.

title: GST 2.0: 'What Rahul says, happens' - Cong claims credit for PM Modi's Diwali gift
content: Prime Minister Modi's Independence Day announcement of a simplified GST structure, dubbed GST 2.0, aiming for cheaper daily-use items, has sparked a political clash. The Congress party claims the idea as their own, referencing their 2024 manifesto and Rahul Gandhi's past calls for similar reforms.

title: 'We wish Ukraine...': PM Modi thanks Zelenskyy for Independence Day greetings
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi expressed gratitude to Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy for his Independence Day greetings, emphasizing the commitment to strengthen bilateral ties and hoping for peace in Ukraine.

title: 'Education is not an event, you can learn forever,' says Perplexity CEO Aravind Srinivas
content: Aravind Srinivas, CEO of Perplexity AI, has shaken the tech world with a $34.5 billion bid to acquire Google Chrome, a bold move that dwarfs his company’s valuation. Speaking at the Oxford Union, he urged students to embrace lifelong learning, declaring, “Education is not an event. You can choose to stop, or you can choose to learn forever.”

title: Asia Cup: Former batter shocks by leaving Gill out of playing XI; check full team
content: Mohammad Kaif has unveiled his predicted India squad for the Asia Cup 2025, sparking debate by including Shubman Gill in the 15-member team but excluding him from the playing XI. Kaif's surprising choices feature Sanju Samson and Abhishek Sharma as openers, with Suryakumar Yadav leading the side and Axar Patel as vice-captain.

title: Sources: Big Ten ponders jump to 24 or 28 in CFP
content: While the idea is in the very early stages, the Big Ten's proposal for a 24- or 28-team College Football Playoff eliminates conference title games and offers a large number of auto bids for all four power leagues.

title: WR Lamb not fined for interfering with official
content: Cowboys wide receiver CeeDee Lamb will not be fined for his unsportsmanlike penalty in last week's preseason game against the Rams, a league official told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

title: Drive for show: Bhatia bags BMW with hole-in-1
content: Akshay Bhatia made an ace on the 17th hole of the BMW Championship, winning a car and boosting his chances of qualifying for the Tour Championship.

title: Ewers makes most of chances in Dolphins' win
content: Quinn Ewers threw two touchdown passes, both to undrafted free agent Theo Wease Jr., in a marked turnaround from a rough debut for the rookie quarterback in Miami's first preseason game last week.

title: Pep wants Man City exits: Squad size 'not healthy'
content: Pep Guardiola claimed Manchester City's squad size is "not healthy" after the team opened its Premier League campaign with a convincing 4-0 win at Wolves.

title: Astros star closer Hader aiming for playoff return
content: Injured Houston Astros All-Star closer Josh Hader said he hopes to pitch again in 2025, even if it just means in the postseason.

title: Commanders activate WR McLaurin off PUP list
content: The Commanders have activated wide receiver Terry McLaurin off the physically unable to perform list.

title: Arrest made for alleged racist abuse at EPL match
content: Semenyo has thanked the "football family" for the support he received after being subjected to alleged racist abuse during Bournemouth's loss at Liverpool.

title: Ultimate Draft Board: Perfect picks for every round in a 12-team league
content: Mike Clay provides his blueprint for 2025 fantasy football drafts, including ideal selections in each round and overall strategy.

title: Tory Horton, Jaxson Dart, Adonai Mitchell among deep sleepers for 2025
content: These sleepers are truly for those in deeper leagues seeking off-the-radar types who may emerge in 2025.

title: Why Bryce Young, C.J. Stroud's childhood bond will 'never waver'
content: Their friendship dates back to AAU hoops and a high school football game to settle the best team in California.

title: Stacking the best, worst positional groups in the NFL: 1-32 rankings, plus roster outlooks
content: Which team has the best wide receivers? The shakiest edge rusher room? We ranked all 32 teams in 10 position groups.

title: Inside the strategy of organizing an NFL locker room
content: NFL coaches are always looking for an edge, and some believe that can be found in the locker room seating chart.

title: Bowl projections: Every matchup from the Celebration Bowl to the national title game
content: It's August and no games have been played, but we're breaking down who will be where in December and beyond.

title: Juan Soto's shuffle bat among best from MLB Players' Weekend
content: Players' Weekend allows player to don and use custom gear reflecting three themes: off-field interests, causes and appreciation.

title: Little League, big dreams: Mets, Mariners players as Little Leaguers
content: From Cal Raleigh to Juan Soto, here's what players in this year's Little League Classic looked like as Little Leaguers themselves.

title: The Hockey Diversity Alliance turns 5: Challenges, triumphs, what's next
content: What started as a group chat in 2020 has become a force for change in expanding hockey to underserved communities.

title: Dive into the ESPN/KFF Survey of 1988 NFL Players
content: Read the key takeaways and methodology of the ESPN/KFF Survey of 1988 NFL Players, and see additional stories and videos from the project.

title: 🎵 Taylor Swift joins Kelce brothers on 'New Heights'
content: The superstar debuted on Jason and Travis Kelce's "New Heights" podcast, talked about becoming a football fan -- and even caught Caitlin Clark's attention.

title: 📈 NFL Future Power Rankings
content: We ranked all 32 NFL franchises' expectations for 2025 through 2027. Which teams are set up to thrive in the future?

title: 🏈 Predicting best, worst scenarios for NFL teams
content: We simulated best-case and worst-case scenarios for every team, and our NFL reporters picked the biggest variables.

title: 🏀 Is there any coming back for banned Knicks fans?
content: Despite backlash, MSG Entertainment's "attorney exclusion list" is still in effect, reportedly banning over a thousand lawyers since 2022.

title: Is Flagg a ROY lock? How 11 rookies can challenge the No. 1 pick
content: NBA analyst Kevin Pelton groups 11 players most likely to threaten the Mavericks' No. 1 pick for the auspicious award.

title: A White House nod boosts the stature of once-shunned MMA
content: Dana White recounts sport's long journey from 'human cockfighting' obscurity to a presidential embrace

title: Transfer rumors, news: Eze keen on Spurs move, amid Arsenal links
content: Manchester City are pondering a move for Paris Saint-Germain goalkeeper Gianluigi Donnarumma if Ederson decides to leave. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Close call: IndiGo flight suffers tail strike; plane lands in 2nd attempt

title: The NBA schedule is out! Best games -- and beefs -- to watch
content: the regular season begins Oct. 21 with reigning NBA champion Kevin Durant 's new team, the Houston Rockets . leBron James , Luka Doncic and the Los Angeles Lakers host Stephen Curry and the Golden State Warriors . plenty of stars will don new jerseys setting up must-see reunions and playoff rematches as the season approaches .

title: Live analysis from UFC 319: Dricus Du Plessis vs. Khamzat Chimaev
content: a middleweight championship bout between Dricus Du Plessis and Khamzat Chimaev would give him his fourth successful title defense, tied for fourth most by a UFC middleweight . former Bellator MMA standout Aaron Pico will make his UFC debut against undefeated featherweight Lerone Murphy .

title: ⛳ Augusta National ditches masses for revenue
content: the 2026 "Official Masters Hospitality" program includes offers of housing, transportation, catering and so on to the corporate and/or well-heeled . the "Full Scale, Private Home Program," which will run you a mere $219,600 for the week, comes days after the announcement that a local Hooters restaurant is closing .

title: From 'KGB' to Central Michigan: What we learned, and didn't learn, from the Michigan report
content: Connor Stalions referred to his advanced sign-stealing operation as both "counterintelligence" and "the KGB" the former Michigan staffer called the video it elicited "dirty film" and ultimately threw his phone in a pond . the punishments for that operation arrived on Friday .

title: NFL preseason Week 2 takeaways: Bryce Young looks shaky, Texans' defense dominates
content: the second week of the 2025 preseason kicks off on friday . the Texans' starting defense is primed to continue from where it finished in 2024: as a top-10 group in total defense . texans quarterback bryce Young was intercepted off a scramble drill on the opening play .

title: Fantasy baseball news: Duran carted off, Muncy sidelined with oblique strain
content: the fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . the remaining 14 games were played under the lights, with four more matinees following, with the final 10 games being evening affairs . for the second straight day, action gets underway at 2:20 p.m. ET .

title: 🏈 Fantasy Football Draft Guide: All you need
content: this draft guide will serve as one-stop shop for all of our best fantasy football picks possible in every draft you're in . we have everything needed to help you draft a great team and start the season with a shot . it doesn't matter whether you have been doing this for years or are a first-timer .

title: What NFL scouts make of Arch Manning, what Texas can expect from him
content: arch Manning will get his chance to be the face of the longhorns this season . he won't get the chance to ease into the starting role as top-ranked Texas will play at defending national champion and no. 3-ranked Ohio State in its season opener on august 30 .

title: Emotion-filled Liverpool summon inner strength for dramatic win
content: Antoine Semenyo scores twice in the second half to cancel out goals from Hugo Ekitike and Cody Gakpo . a minute's silence was observed in memory of Diogo Jota and his brother André Silva . anfield paid an emotional tribute to the portuguese forward .

title: Homecoming: Astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla, 2nd Indian In Space, Lands In Delhi
content: Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla, the second Indian to go to space and the first to visit the International Space Station, has set foot in his homeland again.

title: Alaska Meet Highlights: After Putin Meeting, Ukraine's Zelensky To Meet Trump In Washington On Monday
content: Trump-Putin Alaska Meet Highlights: Donald Trump and his Russian counterpart, Vladimir Putin, did not reach a deal to end Russia's war in Ukraine after talks in Alaska.

title: Putin Wins Ukraine Concessions In Alaska But Did Not Get All He Wanted
content: In a few short hours in Alaska, Vladimir Putin managed to convince Donald Trump that a Ukraine ceasefire was not the way to go, stave off US sanctions, and spectacularly shatter years of Western attempts to isolate the Russian president.

title: 'Maybe It Will End': Russians Welcome Putin-Trump Summit
content: Russian pensioner Lyudmila said she was glued to the coverage of Vladimir Putin's trip to Alaska on Friday for talks with Donald Trump on Ukraine.

title: Gangster Salman Tyagi Found Dead In Delhi Jail, Suicide Suspected: Cops
content: A notorious gangster with several criminal cases registered against him, including those for murder and extortion, was found dead in his cell at Mandoli Jail here on Saturday, officials said.

title: Man Jailed During Emergency Refuses Honour, Gives Minister Memo For Justice
content: An uneasy silence fell over the Independence Day celebrations in Madhya Pradesh's Damoh on Friday after an 84-year-old man who was imprisoned during the Emergency refused an honour and handed an application to the minister instead.

title: 'US Thinks They Can Boss Around': Top Economist Jeffrey Sachs Slams Trump Tariffs On India
content: US economist Jeffrey Sachs has criticised President Donald Trump for slapping hefty tariffs on India, denouncing the policy as both "stupid" and saying it "serves no purpose".

title: US Trade Team's India Visit Called Off, Likely To Be Rescheduled: Sources
content: Amid a strain in economic ties because of the increased tariff, a planned visit by a US team to India for trade negotiations from August 25 to 29 has been cancelled and is likely to be rescheduled, sources have told NDTV Profit.

title: Drug Destruction Up 132%, Seizures Up 104% In Tripura: Chief minister
content: Tripura Chief Minister Prof. Dr Manik Saha on Friday said police and security agencies have been directed to take strict action against those involved in drug smuggling.

title: Fire At Russian Industrial Plant Kills 11, Injures 130
content: A fire at an industrial plant in Russia's Ryazan region on Friday killed 11 people and injured 130, Russian officials said Saturday.

title: After Ruckus At 'Bengal Files' Trailer Launch, Cops Say Vivek Agnihotri Didn't Take Permission
content: Kolkata Police sources have told NDTV that filmmaker Vivek Agnihotri had not sought any administrative permission for public view of the trailer of The Bengal Files in Kolkata.

title: 2 Dead, 95 Injured During 'Dahi Handi' Festivities In Mumbai
content: The death count in 'Dahi Handi' festivities in Mumbai on Saturday touched two after a 14-year-old 'govinda' was declared dead on arrival by doctors in a hospital in Ghatkopar, a civic official said.

title: 4-Year-Old Boy's Genital Chopped Off By Neighbour Couple In Patna: Cops
content: A four-year-old boy was critical after his genital was chopped off allegedly by his neighbour in Patna on Saturday, police said.

title: "Attempt To Mislead": Poll Body Fact-Checks Congress's 'Vote Theft' Video
content: The impasse between the Congress and the Election Commission over allegations of 'vote theft' deepened on Saturday with the poll body fact-checking a video posted by the party, alleging that it was AI-generated and an attempt to mislead voters.

title: Analysis: In High-Stakes Summit, Trump, Not Putin, Budges
content: Donald Trump wanted to go bold -- a high-pomp, high-stakes summit with Vladimir Putin to test whether the Russian leader would compromise on the Ukraine war.

title: Trump Conveyed Putin's Donetsk Demand To Zelensky, He Refused: Report
content: US President Donald Trump said on Saturday Ukraine should make a deal to end the war with Russia because "Russia is a very big power, and they're not", after hosting a summit where Vladimir Putin was reported to have demanded more Ukrainian land.

title: 'Very Frank Talks, Bring Us Closer To Decisions': Putin On Meeting Trump
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Saturday said he discussed ways of ending the conflict in Ukraine "on a fair basis" at his meeting with US President Donald Trump.

title: "Goddess Saved Him": Man, Who Ran Langar For Years, Rescued After 30 Hours In J&K
content: Amid the devastation caused by the cloudburst, Subhash Chandra, who had been running a langar for Mata Machail pilgrims, was rescued alive after being trapped under debris for nearly 30 hours.

title: Video: Jackie Shroff, PETA India Donate Mechanical Elephant To Kerala Temple
content: PETA India and Bollywood actor Jackie Shroff on Saturday gifted a life-size mechanical elephant to the ancient Nediyathali Sri Siva temple at Kodungallur here.

title: PM Modi To Inaugurate Key Rs 11,000 Crore Highway Projects In Delhi Tomorrow
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to inaugurate two major National Highway projects in the national capital on Sunday, that will help in easing congestion on the roads and also add to smooth and better connectivity in Delhi-NCR region.

title: ⚾ MLB awards: Sanchez, Skenes for NL Cy Young?
content: this month's awards watch reflects changes atop some races and separation in others . the two methods of tracking these things are in complete accord when it comes to anointing the current favorites . a lot can and will change in short period of time in a big league baseball season .

title: What are the challenges confronting the EC? | Explained
content: Why is the Election Commission of India in the eye of a storm? What are the allegations raised by the Opposition? What happened after the draft electoral roll was released in Bihar? What is the Supreme Court’s interim order? How are migrant voters going to be affected by the SIR?

title: West Bengal teacher who lost job after SC verdict dies of ‘stress-induced’ stroke
content: Mr. Soren had been a prominent figure at the forefront of the agitations and had been present in multiple instances when police clashed with protesting teachers.

title: How document deficits may risk disenfranchising the poor, eroding trust in the Election Commission
content: Economic location is a major factor in terms of document possession; gap extends to entire families — only about one in every 10 poor households said every adult member had a birth certificate

title: Set up parallel bridges on a war footing: islanders
content: All-party delegation coordinated by FRAG to meet the Chief Minister with a request for setting up parallel bridges to the first and third Goshree bridges

title: Shwetha Menon | Madam president
content: The actor has been elected the first woman president of the Association of Malayalam Movie Artistes, which was rocked by the revelations of the Hema Committee last year

title: Farmers to lay siege to Vidhana Soudha in Bengaluru on August 20
content: A ‘satyagraha’ will be held at Freedom Park in Bengaluru, says H. Bhagyaraj, president of the Karnataka State Sugarcane Growers’ Association

title: U.S. team may defer August 25 India visit for trade pact talks: Official
content: The U.S. is pressing for greater market access in politically sensitive areas such as agri and dairy sectors, which India cannot accept as it affects the livelihood of small and marginal farmers

title: Defeated candidate wins after SC recounts votes in sarpanch election
content: The recount, done by a Registrar of the Supreme Court under video surveillance in the Supreme Court, turned the election result on its head. Mohit Kumar, who had been declared as defeated in the previous result, won by a good margin in the election to a Haryana gram panchayat

title: Karnataka Kolhapuri Chappal makers seek PRADA’s support
content: ‘Most of the production of Kolhapuri chappals happens in Karnataka, while most of the sale happens in Maharashtra. They are named after the city they are sold in, not made in’

title: NCERT module blames Congress for Partition; party says Hindu Mahasabha first suggested the idea
content: Congress, Jinnah and Lord Mountbatten were responsible for Partition, says module meant for Classes 6 to 8; Congress calls it distortion of history

title: Centre should not have asked President to issue Reference, says Kerala
content: Kerala agreed with T.N.’s stand that the April 8 judgment on prescribing timelines for the President and Governors had comprehensively dealt with every single question of law raised in the Presidential Reference

title: Manipur Governor Ajay Kumar Bhalla to hold additional charge of Nagaland
content: Mr. Bhalla has been given the additional charge in the wake of the demise of Nagaland Governor La. Ganesan on August 15

title: Jharkhand lifts night shift ban for women
content: The entire responsibility of the safety and security of women employees will be of the concerned company and its management; the consent of the women employees who will be made to work in night shift is also mandatory

title: Govt. sanctions ₹54 crore for VETRI Palligal to prepare students for JEE, NEET
content: According to a government order, VETRI Palligal in every block would help Class 11 and 12 students get into premier higher education institutions

title: Bengaluru fire accident: Narrow lanes made rescue operations a Herculean task
content: As the fire broke out at the unit containing plastic and packing material, the fire spread rapidly, covering the entire building

title: Rashtrapati Bhavan responds to SOS email by parents of R.G. Kar victim
content: Email response directs the victim’s parents to liaise with the President’s aide; they had reached out to Rashtrapati Bhavan thrice since their daughter’s death, but to no avail

title: Neelam Social releases documentary on conservancy workers’ protests
content: Founded by filmmaker Pa. Ranjith, Neelam Cultural Centre’s YouTube channel especially focusses on social and political issues faced by the marginalised sections of the in society

title: Major irregularities in 2024 Maharashtra Assembly polls, claims Vote for Democracy report
content: A constituency-level study of the election alleges unexplained voter surges, data mismatches, and procedural lapses; the report warns of ‘weaponisation’ of India’s election system and calls for urgent reforms

title: An anonymous life without an Aadhar identity
content: A number of people from tribal communities across Maharashtra face barriers to accessing education, health care, and government schemes because they are not registered with the Unique Identification Authority of India, finds Purnima Sah

title: No foreign voters in Bihar SIR list; Modi brings divisive agenda: CPI(ML)
content: Countering PM Narendra Modi’s statement on Independence Day that illegal immigration is threatening the country’s demography, CPI(ML) general secretary Dipankar Bhattacharya says the SIR exercise in Bihar did not bring out a single case of illegal immigrants in the State

title: Monthly premium for Phase 2 of Medisep enhanced to ₹750
content: Government issues order approving Phase 2 of Medisep which offers an enhanced basic coverage of ₹5 lakh. The scheme has been revamped as per the recommendations of an expert committee

title: Utmost transparency in preparing electoral rolls: Election Commission of India
content: In a statement, the Commission says some political parties did not examine the electoral rolls at the appropriate time and did not point out errors

title: No foreign nationals in Bihar SIR: CPI (ML) Liberation questions PM's 'infiltrator' remark
content: CPI(ML) leader criticises Modi’s anti-immigrant agenda, challenges claims of illegal immigrants in Bihar SIR, ahead of opposition’s Vote Adhikar Yatra

title: Only legally valid cases should be admitted in AC courts, says Karnataka Revenue Minister
content: Revenue Minister Krishna Byre Gowda on Saturday warned Assistant Commissioners against admitting cases beyond their legal jurisdiction

title: Catholic priest’s presence at RSS event in Pala raises eyebrows
content: Father George Nellikunnu Cherivu Purayidom’s participation at the event comes in the wake of recent attacks on nuns and priests from Kerala in Chhattisgarh and Odisha, allegedly by Sangh Parivar activists.

title: Janmashtami celebrated with fervour in Hubballi-Dharwad
content: Devotees prepared 108 delicacies that were offered to the Lord. A 155-kg laddu, prepared from pure desi ghee by Bhairu Caterers Hubballi, became the highlight among the offerings

title: Midweek mayhem: hybrid work clogs Hyderabad’s IT corridor
content: Tuesdays to Thursdays have turned into gridlocks, with traffic up by 25% on key roads connecting Hyderabad’s IT corridor with residential hubs

title: Kochi Corporation accused of awarding contract to fill potholes despite procuring patching machine
content: Limit set for pothole-patching machine exceeded in three to four months after it was used for resurfacing entire stretches, says Mayor

title: Himachal Pradesh outpaces neighbouring States in convening legislative sittings
content: The issue of ‘short duration’ of Assembly sessions often remains a bone of contention between the ruling and the Opposition parties in all three States; according to analysts, a lower number of days and expedited passage of bills typically indicates rushed proceedings with less scrutiny

title: TTD sends cows to 195 temples across India under ‘Gudiko Gomata scheme’
content: At an investment of ₹12.25 crore, TTD has set up S.V. Cattle Fodder Production Unit to ensure high-quality feed for native breeds, says Executive Officer

title: DYFI march to Suresh Gopi’s office turns violent
content: The rally was organised to highlight the alleged voters’ list manipulations in the 2024 Lok Sabha elections

title: Better road infra, aggressive marketing crucial for MICE tourism, destination weddings in Kerala, say experts
content: Suggestions include a high-power committee to sort out infra bottlenecks. Dry day on the first day of every month will be a dampener for such events, say experts

title: Rahul Gandhi’s ‘Vote Adhikar Yatra’ will be historic: Congress leader
content: Mr. Gandhi is expected to be crisscrossing about 25 districts of Bihar, out of a total 38 with three breaks on August 20, 25 and 31 before culminating the journey at Patna with a rally on September 1, says ex-Bihar Congress chief Akhilesh Prasad Singh
